thread.section_title: The Shower Doctor Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of showerdoc.com | 16 of 1022
thread.title: Hugh
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Hugh

author: Hugh
title: Hugh
text:
It was so easy to find the exact shower part that I had deemed faulty and was surprised that I didn't have to buy the whole sub-assembly even though the shower was 12 years old!
The cost of getting it next day was reasonable (even though the part was almost the same price as the postage) but it arrived as promised and, after a 10 minute job, the shower worked as before.
This is the second time I have used Shower Doctor and have no reservations in recommending them.
